strapiEvent.name: Filmed By Bike Film Festival
strapiEvent.description:
Join Pedal it Forward and Arkansas Public Theatre for the 20th Annual Filmed by Bike Film Festival at the Historic Victory Theater in Downtown Rogers on Jul 8, beginning at 7p.

  • Bikes for all: Funds raised by the festival will support Pedal it Forwardâ€™s mission to make bicycles accessible to low-income communities and at-risk youth to promote health, transportation, and recreation.
  • On-screen: Originating in Portland, OR, the Filmed by Bike Festival is renowned for bringing the cycling community together around a wildly diverse collection of inspiring films.

All seats are ticketed, so be sure to get your tickets in advance HERE.
